Title: DNA-Sequencing dataset from the 1000 Genomes Project
Description: DNA-seq data from the 1000 Genomes Project containing 22 AFR, 22 EAS, 21 EUR and 22 SAS samples. there are eight known related pairs including four parent-offspring pairs, two full-sibling pairs and two half-sibling or avuncular pairs in this dataset, which is saved as a Genomic Data Structure (GDS) file.
